## DomoduleSettings type

A catch-all type for Domodule setting blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DomoduleSettings = {
    [index: string]: string[];
};
```

## Example

The `required` property on an instance:

```
this.required: DomoduleSettings = {
    actions: ['click'],
    options: ['example'],
}
```
